title: Gemini CLI v0.28.0
description: Extensions now support custom settings with new theming capabilities and background processing improvements.

title: Claude Code v2.1.41
description: Fixed AWS auth refresh hanging indefinitely by adding a 3-minute timeout and improved auth login experience.

community_feedback.quote: What's new in CC 2.1.41 system prompts (+262 tokens) - discussing changes in system prompts

title: Cursor Composer Feature
description: New Composer feature introduced, along with increased usage limits for agents on individual plans.

community_feedback.quote: Since today on Feb 12 2026, Cursor is not giving good results - Composer 1.5 is worse and couldn't fix an issue several times today
User reported having to switch from auto mode to Opus model to fix issue successfully

title: Cascade Plan Mode Improvements
description: Plan Mode now supports automatic switching back to Code Mode when you start coding.

title: Claude Code v2.1.39
description: Improved terminal rendering performance, fixed fatal errors being swallowed, and various bug fixes.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code is being dumbed down? - #1 post on Hacker News front page for February 11, 2026
Feels like you aren't really listening to the feedback. Is verbose mode the same as the explicit callouts of files read in the previous versions...
Your response is appropriate for the masses. But we're not. We're the so called hackers and read right through the bs.

title: API v3 Updates
description: Added IP access list endpoints and improved tag validation for sessions.

title: GPT-5.3-Codex Release
description: OpenAI released GPT-5.3-Codex, described as the most capable agentic coding model yet, running 25% faster with improved infrastructure and inference optimization.

community_feedback.quote: GPT-5.3-Codex - talks through what it's doing, responds to feedback, and keeps you in the loop from start to finish
Codex performance has significantly degraded after the 5.3 API update - discussing silent downgrade mechanism
How do we know we're actually getting 5.3 Codex and not being silently downgraded?
I've already switched back to gpt-5.2 high from gpt-5.3 codex high

title: Codex CLI Enhancements
description: Added personal skill loading capabilities, new remote skill APIs, modernized plan inputs and TUI, and Codex Desktop on macOS now launches from CLI with auto DMG fetch.

title: Claude Code v2.1.31
description: Added session resume hint on exit, improved startup performance by deferring Zod schema construction, and improved prompt cache hit rates.

title: Cursor 2.2 Plan Mode Improvements
description: Improved plan mode functionality with better context management and quality-of-life fixes in the editor.

title: GitHub Copilot Visual Studio January Update
description: Colorized code completions, partial acceptance of code completions, and productivity improvements.

title: GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark Available
description: New GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark model is now available in Arena.

title: February 3, 2026 Update
description: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements across the platform.

title: Gemini CLI v0.27.0
description: New event-driven architecture for tool execution, resulting in a more responsive experience.
